mn50:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
mn50:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno abbhokāse caṅkamati.
mn50:2.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena māro pāpimā āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa kucchigato hoti koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭho.
mn50:2.4_0: “kiṁ nu kho me kucchi garugaro viya?
mn50:2.6_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno caṅkamā orohitvā vihāraṁ pavisitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
mn50:3.1_0: Nisajja kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno paccattaṁ yoniso manasākāsi.
mn50:3.2_0: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno māraṁ pāpimantaṁ kucchigataṁ koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭhaṁ.
mn50:3.7_0: Mā te ahosi dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyā”ti.
mn50:4.2_0: “ajānameva kho maṁ ayaṁ samaṇo apassaṁ evamāha:
mn50:4.6_0: Mā te ahosi dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyā’ti.
mn50:4.7_0: Yopissa so satthā sopi maṁ neva khippaṁ jāneyya, kuto pana maṁ ayaṁ sāvako jānissatī”ti?
mn50:5.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno māraṁ pāpimantaṁ etadavoca:
mn50:5.2_0: “evampi kho tāhaṁ, pāpima, jānāmi, mā tvaṁ maññittho:
mn50:5.6_0: ‘ajānameva kho maṁ ayaṁ samaṇo apassaṁ evamāha—
mn50:5.10_0: Mā te ahosi dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyāti.
mn50:5.11_0: Yopissa so satthā sopi maṁ neva khippaṁ jāneyya, kuto pana maṁ ayaṁ sāvako jānissatī’”ti?
mn50:6.2_0: “jānameva kho maṁ ayaṁ samaṇo passaṁ evamāha:
mn50:6.6_0: Mā te ahosi dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyā’”ti.
mn50:6.7_0: Atha kho māro pāpimā āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa mukhato uggantvā paccaggaḷe aṭṭhāsi.
mn50:7.1_0: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno māraṁ pāpimantaṁ paccaggaḷe ṭhitaṁ;
mn50:7.3_0: “etthāpi kho tāhaṁ, pāpima, passāmi; mā tvaṁ maññittho
mn50:8.1_0: Bhūtapubbāhaṁ, pāpima, dūsī nāma māro ahosiṁ, tassa me kāḷī nāma bhaginī.
mn50:9.1_0: Tena kho pana, pāpima, samayena kakusandho bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho loke uppanno hoti.
mn50:9.2_1: bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa vidhurasañjīvaṁ nāma sāvakayugaṁ ahosi aggaṁ bhaddayugaṁ.
mn50:9.3_0: Yāvatā kho pana, pāpima, kakusandhassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa sāvakā.
mn50:9.4_0: Tesu na ca koci āyasmatā vidhurena samasamo hoti yadidaṁ dhammadesanāya.
mn50:9.5_0: Iminā kho evaṁ, pāpima, pariyāyena āyasmato vidhurassa vidhuroteva samaññā udapādi.
mn50:10.1_1: sañjīvo araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi appakasireneva saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjati.
mn50:10.2_1: āyasmā sañjīvo aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpanno nisinno hoti.
mn50:10.3_1: gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino āyasmantaṁ sañjīvaṁ aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannaṁ nisinnaṁ;
mn50:10.8_1: gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca gomayañca saṅkaḍḍhitvā āyasmato sañjīvassa kāye upacinitvā aggiṁ datvā pakkamiṁsu.
mn50:11.1_1: āyasmā sañjīvo tassā rattiyā accayena tāya samāpattiyā vuṭṭhahitvā cīvarāni papphoṭetvā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ
mn50:11.2_1: gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino āyasmantaṁ sañjīvaṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ;
mn50:11.5_0: Ayaṁ samaṇo nisinnakova kālaṅkato, svāyaṁ paṭisañjīvito’ti.
mn50:11.6_0: Iminā kho evaṁ, pāpima, pariyāyena āyasmato sañjīvassa sañjīvoteva samaññā udapādi.
mn50:12.1_0: Atha kho, pāpima, dūsissa mārassa etadahosi:
mn50:12.2_0: ‘imesaṁ kho ahaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sīlavantānaṁ kalyāṇadhammānaṁ neva jānāmi āgatiṁ vā gatiṁ vā.
mn50:12.4_0: etha, tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme akkosatha paribhāsatha rosetha vihesetha.
mn50:12.5_0: Appeva nāma tumhehi akkosiyamānānaṁ paribhāsiyamānānaṁ rosiyamānānaṁ vihesiyamānānaṁ siyā cittassa aññathattaṁ,
mn50:12.5_1: yathā taṁ dūsī māro labhetha otāran’ti.
mn50:12.6_0: Atha kho te, pāpima, dūsī māro brāhmaṇagahapatike anvāvisi:
mn50:12.7_0: ‘etha, tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme akkosatha paribhāsatha rosetha vihesetha.
mn50:12.8_0: Appeva nāma tumhehi akkosiyamānānaṁ paribhāsiyamānānaṁ rosiyamānānaṁ vihesiyamānānaṁ siyā cittassa aññathattaṁ,
mn50:12.8_1: yathā taṁ dūsī māro labhetha otāran’ti.
mn50:13.1_1: brāhmaṇagahapatikā anvāvisiṭṭhā dūsinā mārena bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme akkosanti paribhāsanti rosenti vihesenti:
mn50:13.2_0: ‘ime pana muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kiṇhā bandhupādāpaccā “jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā”ti pattakkhandhā adhomukhā
mn50:13.3_0: Seyyathāpi nāma ulūko rukkhasākhāyaṁ mūsikaṁ maggayamāno jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati;
mn50:13.4_0: evamevime muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kiṇhā bandhupādāpaccā “jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā”ti pattakkhandhā adhomukhā
mn50:13.5_0: Seyyathāpi nāma kotthu nadītīre macche maggayamāno jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati;
mn50:13.6_0: evamevime muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kiṇhā bandhupādāpaccā “jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā”ti pattakkhandhā adhomukhā
mn50:13.7_0: Seyyathāpi nāma biḷāro sandhisamalasaṅkaṭīre mūsikaṁ maggayamāno jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati;
mn50:13.8_0: evamevime muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kiṇhā bandhupādāpaccā “jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā”ti pattakkhandhā adhomukhā
mn50:13.9_0: Seyyathāpi nāma gadrabho vahacchinno sandhisamalasaṅkaṭīre jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati;
mn50:13.10_0: evamevime muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kiṇhā bandhupādāpaccā “jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā”ti pattakkhandhā adhomukhā
mn50:13.11_1: tena samayena manussā kālaṁ karonti yebhuyyena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti.
mn50:14.1_0: Atha kho, pāpima, kakusandho bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn50:14.3_1: tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme akkosatha paribhāsatha rosetha vihesetha,
mn50:14.3_2: appeva nāma tumhehi akkosiyamānānaṁ paribhāsiyamānānaṁ rosiyamānānaṁ vihesiyamānānaṁ siyā cittassa aññathattaṁ,
mn50:14.3_3: yathā taṁ dūsī māro labhetha otāran’ti.
mn50:14.4_2: mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha,
mn50:14.4_6: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
mn50:14.7_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha,
mn50:14.7_4: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
mn50:15.1_1: bhikkhū kakusandhena bhagavatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena evaṁ ovadiyamānā evaṁ anusāsiyamānā araññagatāpi
mn50:15.1_2: rukkhamūlagatāpi suññāgāragatāpi mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā vihariṁsu,
mn50:15.1_6: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
mn50:15.4_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā vihariṁsu,
mn50:15.4_4: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
mn50:16.1_0: Atha kho, pāpima, dūsissa mārassa etadahosi:
mn50:16.2_0: ‘evampi kho ahaṁ karonto imesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sīlavantānaṁ kalyāṇadhammānaṁ neva jānāmi āgatiṁ vā gatiṁ vā,
mn50:16.3_0: “etha, tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme sakkarotha garuṁ karotha mānetha pūjetha,
mn50:16.4_0: appeva nāma tumhehi sakkariyamānānaṁ garukariyamānānaṁ māniyamānānaṁ pūjiyamānānaṁ siyā cittassa aññathattaṁ,
mn50:16.4_1: yathā taṁ dūsī māro labhetha otāran”’ti.
mn50:17.1_0: Atha kho te, pāpima, dūsī māro brāhmaṇagahapatike anvāvisi:
mn50:17.2_0: ‘etha, tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme sakkarotha garuṁ karotha mānetha pūjetha,
mn50:17.3_0: appeva nāma tumhehi sakkariyamānānaṁ garukariyamānānaṁ māniyamānānaṁ pūjiyamānānaṁ siyā cittassa aññathattaṁ,
mn50:17.3_1: yathā taṁ dūsī māro labhetha otāran’ti.
mn50:17.4_1: brāhmaṇagahapatikā anvāviṭṭhā dūsinā mārena bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme sakkaronti garuṁ karonti mānenti pūjenti.
mn50:17.5_1: tena samayena manussā kālaṁ karonti yebhuyyena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
mn50:18.1_0: Atha kho, pāpima, kakusandho bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn50:18.3_0: “etha, tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme sakkarotha garuṁ karotha mānetha pūjetha,
mn50:18.4_0: appeva nāma tumhehi sakkariyamānānaṁ garukariyamānānaṁ māniyamānānaṁ pūjiyamānānaṁ siyā cittassa aññathattaṁ,
mn50:18.4_1: yathā taṁ dūsī māro labhetha otāran”ti.
mn50:19.1_1: bhikkhū kakusandhena bhagavatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena evaṁ ovadiyamānā evaṁ anusāsiyamānā araññagatāpi
mn50:20.1_1: kakusandho bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya āyasmatā vidhurena pacchāsamaṇena gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
mn50:21.1_1: dūsī māro aññataraṁ kumārakaṁ anvāvisitvā sakkharaṁ gahetvā āyasmato vidhurassa sīse pahāramadāsi;
mn50:21.2_1: āyasmā vidhuro bhinnena sīsena lohitena gaḷantena kakusandhaṁyeva bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.
mn50:21.3_0: Atha kho, pāpima, kakusandho bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho nāgāpalokitaṁ apalokesi:
mn50:21.5_0: Sahāpalokanāya ca pana, pāpima, dūsī māro tamhā ca ṭhānā cavi mahānirayañca upapajji.
mn50:22.1_0: Tassa kho pana, pāpima, mahānirayassa tayo nāmadheyyā honti—
mn50:22.2_0: chaphassāyataniko itipi, saṅkusamāhato itipi, paccattavedaniyo itipi.
mn50:22.3_0: Atha kho maṁ, pāpima, nirayapālā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ:
mn50:22.4_0: ‘yadā kho te, mārisa, saṅkunā saṅku hadaye samāgaccheyya.
mn50:23.1_1: bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni tasmiṁ mahāniraye apacciṁ.
mn50:23.2_0: Dasavassasahassāni tasseva mahānirayassa ussade apacciṁ vuṭṭhānimaṁ nāma vedanaṁ vediyamāno.
mn50:23.3_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, pāpima, evarūpo kāyo hoti, seyyathāpi manussassa.
mn50:32.4_0: Dūsī ca māro dasamo ca vaggo.
